title: Got Banned For No Reason
body:
So here's my story: 

The last time I played league was like 4 weeks ago, I went out to visit my family and chill with them for a few weeks, during that time I really missed playing league (but had a great time hanging out with my family). I came back home today and I was like, "YES I CAN FINALLY PLAY LEAGUE AGAIN!", I put in my username and password and pressed enter, guess what. I GOT BANNED! RITO! Why did you ban ME?! I PROBABLY DID NOTHING WRONG! They didn't even SEND me an email (when you get banned you get an email telling you why you got banned), I probably did nothing wrong and you don't even tell me what I did wrong also. plz rito, look into this. 

MAYBE IT'S ANONYMOUS!

Naw, I ain't one of those narcissistic teeneagers that think that their important, just one of the few million players out their

replies.body: BroPoro is it possible for you to email me telling me how much money the chargeback was?
Reach out to us in that [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we'll be able to go over everything with you there ^_^!
Hi I looked into it and, is the email sent to my account I used to verify my league account? Because if it is I didn't get an email.

Hmmmm that's rather strange that you'd get banned without even having played! I looked into your account, and it looks like a chargeback had been issued on some of the purchases you made. Check out our [**policies on chargebacks**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201753334), then reach out to our billing team in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
